nodes.text: The Alcazar was a cantina located in the planet Akiva's capital Myrra that served as the headquarters for the Sullustan crime lord Surat Nuat's gang. He imprisoned several of his foes including Jas Emari, Sinjir Rath Velus, and Temmin Wexley there. The Alcazar was damaged when the three prisoners escaped with the help of the modified B1-series battle droid Mister Bones.
